extension.name: Populate Employer for Anonymous Users
extension.description: When an anonymous visitor fills profiles and other forms having email address and employer fields, this extension searches for an individual with a matching email address and populates the form with his or her employer. This requires granting the "access AJAX API" permission to anonymous users.
extension.comments: This is meant to address problems in CRM-10128 (leaving the employer blank on a profile will unset your current employer if you have one) and problems of people typing organization names different ways.
